tweet: Join us in welcoming David Esser, senior product manager, to the Cardano Project! David brings extensive experience in product management and will be an extraordinary asset in further advancing the Cardano project. Learn more about him here:  https://t.co/8O3tb9T6vx

Aggelos Kiayias will be speaking at the IOHK Summit! His research has foundations in cryptography with an emphasis in blockchain technologies and distributed systems. Interested in hearing his talk? Get your tickets here:  https://t.co/wk6BRHjEFU #IOHKSummit2019 #Cardano

IOHK is proud to announce and welcome David Esser, as senior product manager for the Cardano blockchain platform. He comes to IOHK with extensive experience - 20 years in product management and 13 years as a chief technology officer. Read more about David:  https://t.co/a8gW92OYtL  https://t.co/zMAlnDbWUg
